item.title: About Me!
item.description: My name is Caroline Begg, and I am a sophomore in the M&T program (dual degree between Wharton and Penn Engineering) studying CIS and Finance/Business Analytics. I am originally from Trumbull, CT. At home, I live with my parents and my four pets (two dogs and two cats!); my older sister Kay lives in Dallas, TX. Outside of the classroom, I am super involved in lots of different ways on campus, including academic, social, and preprofessional clubs, and also am passionate about philanthrophy work to give back to the local Philly community.
